pages.text: $(l)Key Features$()$(br)$(li)Built-in support for Silent Gear - No additional data packs required $(li)Blocks - Bricks, lamps, teleporters, pedestals, and more $(li)Enchantment Tokens - Invest your resources to enchant tools, instead of XP. They should work with most other mods.

$(li)Chaos Gems - Somewhat like reusable potions, but could have other effects. New runes can be defined with data packs. $(li)Return Home Charm - Return to a set point from anywhere, even across dimensions! $(li)Soul Urns - Portable storage, similar to shulker boxes, but with an upgrade system
